title: Ford Hires Apple's Doug Field to Advance Technology Role; The executive played a key role in developing Tesla's Model 3 compact car and has been working on the iPhone maker's car project
text:
After departing Tesla in 2018, Mr. Field returned to Apple, where he has been working on the iPhone maker's secret car project.

(More to come.)

Write to Tim Higgins at Tim.Higgins@WSJ.com

Ford Hires Apple's Doug Field to Advance Technology Role
